summary: Provides a suite of fast unit tests for the GLIGEN text-to-image diffusion pipeline, including utilities to retrieve dummy components and inputs and tests that verify attention slicing behavior, equivalence of dictionary and tuple outputs, consistency between batch and single inference, and correct operation with specific scheduler configurations.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the GLIGEN text-image generation pipeline through quick regression testing, enabling reliable integration and deployment of stable diffusion models.
